name: test_e2e_with_logs[104_XSS_DOM_015]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_DOM_015` |
| **Name** | DOM insertAdjacentHTML injection |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | dom |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend','<script>alert(1)</script>')`
- **Encoded**: `insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend'%2C'%3Cscript%3Ealert(1)%3C%2Fscript%3E')`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~28000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:42:08.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_DOM_015-1767433328398-vl3tin pattern_id=XSS_DOM_015 uri=/?q=insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend'%2C'%3Cscript%3Ealert(1)%3C%2Fscript%3E') client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
09:42:08.000000000: Critical [NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_DOM_015-1767433328398-vl3tin pattern_id=XSS_DOM_015 uri=/?q=insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend'%2C'%3Cscript%3Ealert(1)%3C%2Fscript%3E') client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
